categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text:
During the Cold War, a battle between Republic-aligned smugglers and
Sith Empire arose in the Ezran system.
The Imperial Intelligence discovered that in the Ezran system smugglers with Republic sympathies had constructed a space station that used for their traffic, that undermined the Empire's commerce. So the Sith Command send the elite Imperial Emperor's Fury starfighter squadron to clear the zone and they obliterated the smugglers forces.
